participant_1.background:

I created a mobile with cute animals to hang above my baby's crib.
i have a gambling problem.
Last year, I found inspiration in the world and used it to help my clients with their taxes.
i am very health conscious , and i watch what i eat.

participant_2.background:
I got a new dog last Christmas and we love going running together.
music has always been my number one passion.
i enjoy watching football and hockey games.
I have a collection of larp weapons and armor.
I have a cat who was a stray that we adopted.

content.text: Hello there, I'm doing great! How are you today?
I'm doing pretty well, thanks for asking! I recently got a new dog and we love going running together. What are your hobbies?
Music has always been my number one passion. I love playing my guitar and singing. I also enjoy watching football and hockey games.
That's awesome! I'm a big football fan myself. I enjoy watching games and playing fantasy football. I also enjoy watching hockey, but I'm not as big of a fan as I am of football.
That's cool! I'm not very good at fantasy football, but I still enjoy watching the games. I also have a collection of LARP weapons and armor that I like to use for role-playing games.
That's really cool! I've never been to a LARP game before, but I've heard they can be a lot of fun. I also have a cat who was a stray that we adopted.
That's awesome! I love cats. I have a dog and a cat, and they're both really good pets.
That's great! I'm glad to hear that you have such great pets.
